item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Cormac McCarthy
item.description: "Nobody wants to be here and nobody wants to leave." -- Cormac McCarthy

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Cormac McCarthy
item.description: "You think when you wake up in the mornin yesterday don't count. But yesterday is all that does count. What else is there? Your life is made out of the days it’s made out of. Nothin else." -- Cormac McCarthy

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Cormac McCarthy
item.description: "What business is it of yours where I'm from, friendo?" -- Cormac McCarthy

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by M. Scott Peck
item.description: "Share our similarities, celebrate our differences." -- M. Scott Peck

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by M. Scott Peck
item.description: "We must be willing to fail and to appreciate the truth that often "Life is not a problem to be solved, but a mystery to be lived." -- M. Scott Peck

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by M. Scott Peck
item.description: "You cannot truly listen to anyone and do anything else at the same time. " -- M. Scott Peck

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Gary Zukav
item.description: "For every action there is an equal and opposite reaction. You receive from the world what you give to the world." -- Gary Zukav

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Eckhart Tolle
item.description: "When you don't cover up the world with words and labels, a sense of the miraculous returns to your life that was lost a long time ago when humanity, instead of using thought, became possessed by thought." -- Eckhart Tolle

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Eckhart Tolle
item.description: "Life will give you whatever experience is most helpful for the evolution of your consciousness. How do you know this is the experience you need? Because this is the experience you are having at the moment." -- Eckhart Tolle

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Eckhart Tolle
item.description: "Some changes look negative on the surface but you will soon realize that space is being created in your life for something new to emerge." -- Eckhart Tolle

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Eckhart Tolle
item.description: "Realize deeply that the present moment is all you have. Make the NOW the primary focus of your life." -- Eckhart Tolle

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Eckhart Tolle
item.description: "Humanity is now faced with a stark choice: Evolve or die. … If the structures of the human mind remain unchanged, we will always end up re-creating the same world, the same evils, the same dysfunction." -- Eckhart Tolle

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Eckhart Tolle
item.description: "All true artists, whether they know it or not, create from a place of no-mind, from inner stillness." -- Eckhart Tolle

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Eckhart Tolle
item.description: "Man made God in his own image..." -- Eckhart Tolle

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Eckhart Tolle
item.description: "What you react to in others, you strengthen in yourself." -- Eckhart Tolle

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Eckhart Tolle
item.description: "Pleasure is always derived from something outside you, whereas joy arises from within." -- Eckhart Tolle

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Augusten Burroughs
item.description: "I myself am made entirely of flaws, stitched together with good intentions." -- Augusten Burroughs

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Augusten Burroughs
item.description: "Although I was able to maintain a pleasant expression, I was mentally throwing up in her face." -- Augusten Burroughs

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Augusten Burroughs
item.description: "My mother began to go crazy. Not in a 'Let's paint the kitchen red!' sort of way. But crazy in a 'gas oven, toothpaste sandwhich, I am God' sort of way." -- Augusten Burroughs

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Augusten Burroughs
item.description: "We were young. We were bored. And the old electroshock therapy machine was just under the stairs in a box next to the Hoover." -- Augusten Burroughs

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "Everyone looks retarded once you set your mind to it." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "If you're looking for sympathy you'll find it between shit and syphilis in the dictionary." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by david sedaris
item.description: "On a busy day twenty-two thousand people come to visit Santa, and I was told that it is an elf's lot to remain merry in the face of torment and adversity. I promised to keep that in mind." -- david sedaris

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "I haven't the slightest idea how to change people, but still I keep a long list of prospective candidates just in case I should ever figure it out." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "I love things made out of animals. It's just so funny to think of someone saying, "I need a letter opener. I guess I'll have to kill a deer." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by John Grogan
item.description: "Animal lovers are a special breed of humans, generous of spirit, full of empathy, perhaps a little prone to sentimentality, and with hearts as big as a cloudless sky" -- John Grogan

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Get busy living or get busy dying." -- Stephen King

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "When his life was ruined, his family killed, his farm destroyed, Job knelt down on the ground and yelled up to the heavens, "Why god? Why me?" and the thundering voice of God answered, There's just something about you that pisses me off." -- Stephen King

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Robert Bloch
item.description: "Despite my ghoulish reputation, I really have the heart of a small boy. I keep it in a jar on my desk." -- Robert Bloch

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Sometimes being a bitch is all a woman's got to hold on to." -- Stephen King
